## StorageManager class

A basic manager for storing and fetching the local cached JSON files.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class StorageManager implements BaseManager<any> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [BaseManager](./shieldbow.basemanager.md)

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(client, pathName, root)](./shieldbow.storagemanager._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>StorageManager</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [cache](./shieldbow.storagemanager.cache.md) |  | Collection&lt;string, any&gt; | An in-memory cache that stores the JSON data to serve data faster. |
|  [client](./shieldbow.storagemanager.client.md) |  | [Client](./shieldbow.client.md) | The client this Manager belongs to. |
|  [pathName](./shieldbow.storagemanager.pathname.md) |  | string | The path of the base directory to fetch/store files from/in |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [fetch(id)](./shieldbow.storagemanager.fetch.md) |  | Fetch the locally stored JSON file by its name. |
|  [store(id, data)](./shieldbow.storagemanager.store.md) |  | Store a JSON file locally. |
